Articles.Content:
Hello all!

After spending a good month lurking while making my first few step through the game I finally decided to join the forums and hopefully get some help and join in the fun.

Having a fun time after I decided to pick this up in the Steam Sale . It perked my interest since I took an Astronautics course in College a few years ago and this does such a great job of simulating it. Its really cool to take the knowledge from that class and use it in a fun way! It was quite nice knowing most of the terminology before I started to even play, and had an idea on how to actually do maneuvers in space.

Currently I have done enough to pretty much fill out the tech tree in career mode, and am just starting to do some things that I think would be fun, like building a refueling space station in HKO, and finally making trips to and from the places I've only flown by (or crashed into!) and the ones I have yet to see.

Thanks to those how have put so much useful content on the site already as its helped my so much to get over some of the more difficult humps in my launches.

Hopefully see you all around the forums!

Hello, Welcome to the KSP Forums! It's good to see a new person that knows a lot already joining the forums. You'll see me a lot around here! I'm active every day and post every day! Perhaps if you haven't already maybe you'd like to view the forum rules.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064

Glad that you got Kerbal Space Program for a great price!

Also you might want to read the Good Conduct Guide And The What Not to Suggest. If you haven't done so already.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/13142-The-Good-Conduct-Guide

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest

Have fun!

~Lolaks
